description: Toolkit-skills plugin hooks. Stop hook suggests /reflect for sessions with learnings.

hooks.prompt:
Before stopping, check if this session had corrections, discoveries, or validated patterns worth remembering. If significant learnings found, respond with a systemMessage suggesting /reflect. Be selective - only suggest for sessions with clear teachable moments.

Respond with JSON: {"decision": "approve", "reason": "your analysis", "systemMessage": "optional suggestion to run /reflect if learnings detected"}
